summary: REQ-1/2/3/4 appear implemented in the frontend (customer category dropdown + legacy fallback, matching properties on customer details, dashboard match computation with local dismissal persistence, and reminder creation gated behind an Add Reminder dialog). REQ-5 is only partially implemented: the new “Excel” I/O utility exports/imports CSV (not .xlsx), so the explicit .xlsx requirement is not met based on the diff evidence. The diff also includes several unrelated features (auth/branding/navigation/online indicator) that were not requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Export generates an .xlsx file containing the app’s locally stored data; import accepts an .xlsx file and restores data into local storage with validation and user-visible error messages.
missing_requirements.reason: The added utility named excelIo exports a CSV blob with a .csv filename (not .xlsx). No evidence of XLSX generation/parsing (e.g., SheetJS) is present in the diff summary, and Settings explicitly labels/export-to-CSV and shows toast text about CSV.
